Recent updates in NYC include a brief suspension of PATH train service due to a suspicious package, ongoing efforts to rescue a worker trapped under a collapsed tower, and a significant rise in violence within city jails, alongside preparations for the mayoral election and various community initiatives.

### Risks & Alerts

- PATH train service on Sixth Ave line briefly suspended due to a suspicious package.
